Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

wait() --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer print('Transport Script') local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) print(parent, childName) while parent:FindFirstChild(childName) == nil do wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent
local FlightPower local FlightSpin local FlightHold
local CamSpeedZ = 50 local CamSpeedX = 40
local Forwards = false local Back = false local Left = false local Right = false
local MovementHandlerCo
local Hover = -0.1
local HorseActivate
local Player = Game.Players.LocalPlayer while Player.Character == nil do wait() end local Character = Player.Character local Torso = WaitForChild(Character, 'Torso')
function HandleMovementFrame() local newPush = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) local forwardVector = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, -1))
if Forwards and not Back then newPush = forwardVector * CamSpeedZ end if Back and not Forwards then newPush = newPush + forwardVector * -CamSpeedZ end if Left and not Right then newPush = newPush + game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0)) * CamSpeedX end if Right and not Left then newPush = newPush + game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)) * CamSpeedX end
FlightSpin.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), forwardVector) -- have torso face Forwards if newPush.magnitude < 1 then FlightHold.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) FlightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) if Torso then FlightHold.position = Torso.Position end else FlightHold.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, FlightHold.P/100, 0) FlightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(FlightPower.P * 100, 0, FlightPower.P * 100) end FlightPower.velocity = newPush end
function HandleMovement() HorseActivate = Tool:FindFirstChild("HorseActivate") if HorseActivate then while HorseActivate.Value do HandleMovementFrame() wait() end end end
function KeyUpFunc(key) if key == nil then return end local key = key:lower() if key == "w" then Forwards = false elseif key == "a" then Left = false elseif key == "s" then Back = false elseif key == "d" then Right = false end end
function KeyDownFunc(key) if key == nil then return end local key = key:lower() if key == "w" then Forwards = true elseif key == "a" then Left = true elseif key == "s" then Back = true elseif key == "d" then Right = true end end
function Transport() HorseActivate = Tool:FindFirstChild("HorseActivate") if HorseActivate then if HorseActivate.Value == 0 then return end end if Torso == nil then return end
FlightPower = Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightPower") FlightSpin = Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightSpin") FlightHold = Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightHold")
while FlightPower == nil or FlightSpin == nil or FlightHold == nil do Torso.ChildAdded:wait() FlightPower = Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightPower") FlightSpin = Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightSpin") FlightHold = Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightHold") end MovementHandlerCo = coroutine.create(HandleMovement) coroutine.resume(MovementHandlerCo) end
function OnEquipped(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Torso = WaitForChild(Character, 'Torso') if mouse then Forwards = false Back = false Left = false Right = false mouse.KeyDown:connect(KeyDownFunc) mouse.KeyUp:connect(KeyUpFunc) end HorseActivate = WaitForChild(Tool, "HorseActivate") if HorseActivate then HorseActivate.Changed:connect(Transport) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)

wait() --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) print(parent, childName) while parent:FindFirstChild(childName) == nil do wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent local Horse = Tool.Handle
local Player local Character local Torso local Humanoid
local FlightSpin local FlightPower local FlightHold
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local RightLeg local LeftLeg
local LeftLegClone local RightLegClone
local HorseActivate = WaitForChild(Tool, 'HorseActivate')
local Factor = 177 local Riding = false
local AnimateScript
local Gui = Instance.new('ScreenGui') local RbxGui = LoadLibrary('RbxGui')
local TorsoConnection
local Mouse
local RightArm local RightGrip
local Gravity = 196.2 local TimeTaken = 0 local Velocity = 200.0
local SitAnim
local function CreateCloneLegs() LeftLegClone = LeftLeg:Clone() RightLegClone = RightLeg:Clone()
local lMotor = WaitForChild(Torso, 'Left Hip'):Clone() local rMotor = WaitForChild(Torso, 'Right Hip'):Clone()
lMotor.Part1 = LeftLegClone rMotor.Part1 = RightLegClone
lMotor.Name = 'Fake Left Hip' rMotor.Name = 'Fake Right Hip'
lMotor.Parent = LeftLegClone rMotor.Parent = RightLegClone
lMotor.C1 = lMotor.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2) rMotor.C1 = rMotor.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, -math.pi/2)
LeftLegClone.Parent = Character RightLegClone.Parent = Character
AnimateScript.Disabled = true end
local function DestroyCloneLegs() if LeftLegClone then LeftLegClone:Destroy() end if RightLegClone then RightLegClone:Destroy() end AnimateScript.Disabled = false end
local function Trample(hitPart) if hitPart and hitPart.Parent and hitPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then hitPart.Parent.Humanoid.Sit = true hitPart.Velocity = (hitPart.Position - Torso.Position).unit * 45.0 end end
function ComputeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, grav) -- This function is nasty or what? :P -- There are ways to solve launch angle of a projectile given a point in 3D space -- This one solves for tan(theta)
-- Simplify the distance formula of a projectile local g = math.abs(grav) local inRoot = (Velocity * Velocity * Velocity * Velocity) - (g * ((g * dx * dx) + (2 * dy * Velocity * Velocity))) if inRoot <= 0 then return 0.25 * math.pi end local root = math.sqrt(inRoot) local inATan1 = ((Velocity * Velocity) + root) / (g*dx)
local inATan2 = ((Velocity * Velocity) - root) / (g*dx) local a1 = math.atan(inATan1) local a2 = math.atan(inATan2) if a1 < a2 then return a1 end return a2 end
local function ThrowHorse() Tool.Enabled = false local cClone = Instance.new('Part') cClone.Shape = 'Ball' cClone.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) cClone.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Dark orange')
local spawnPos = Torso.Position + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0 cClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos) local target = Mouse.Hit.p
local toTarget = target - spawnPos local dY = toTarget.Y toTarget = Vector3.new(toTarget.X, 0, toTarget.Z) local dXZ = toTarget.magnitude toTarget = toTarget.unit local theta = ComputeLaunchAngle(dXZ, dY, Gravity)
local angleY = math.sin(theta) local angleXZ = math.cos(theta)
local vY = angleY * Velocity local vX = toTarget.X * angleXZ * Velocity local vZ = toTarget.Z * angleXZ * Velocity
cClone.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) cClone.Parent = Game.Workspace cClone.Touched:connect(function(hitPart) if hitPart and hitPart.Parent and hitPart.Parent ~= Character and cClone and cClone:FindFirstChild('Welded') == nil and hitPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then --cClone.Size = Vector3.new(6, 6, 6) local cWeld = Instance.new('Weld') cWeld.Name = 'Welded' cWeld.Part0 = hitPart cWeld.Part1 = cClone cWeld.Parent = cClone cWeld.C1 = cClone.CFrame * hitPart.CFrame:inverse()
DebrisService:AddItem(cClone, 4.5) end end) Spawn(function() wait(3.5) if cClone:FindFirstChild('Welded') == nil then cClone:Destroy() end end) cClone.CanCollide = true wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
local function OnActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
if HorseActivate.Value == false then Riding = true
FlightSpin = Instance.new("BodyGyro") FlightPower = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") FlightHold = Instance.new("BodyPosition")
FlightHold.Name = "FlightHold" FlightHold.P = 100000 FlightHold.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
FlightPower.Name = "FlightPower" FlightPower.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) FlightPower.P = 1000000 FlightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(FlightPower.P, FlightPower.P, FlightPower.P) FlightPower.P = 10000
FlightSpin.Name = "FlightSpin" FlightSpin.P = 1000000 FlightSpin.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, FlightSpin.P, 0)
FlightSpin.cframe = Torso.CFrame FlightHold.position = Torso.Position
FlightSpin.Parent = Torso FlightHold.Parent = Torso FlightPower.Parent = Torso
HorseActivate.Value = true
RightArm = WaitForChild(Character, 'Right Arm') print(Character, RightArm, Character.Parent) --Game.Selection:Set({RightArm}) RightGrip = WaitForChild(RightArm, 'RightGrip') RightGrip.Part0 = Torso RightGrip.Part1 = Horse Horse.Size = Vector3.new(5, 8.5, 5) RightGrip.Parent = Torso RightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -1.39999998, 1.5, 1, -1.36735394e-014, 1.74845582e-007, -1.74845553e-007, 1.31134186e-007, 1, -2.34655502e-014, -1, 1.31134186e-007)
--CreateCloneLegs()
SitAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SitAnim) if SitAnim then SitAnim:Play() end
--RightLeg.Transparency = 1.0 --LeftLeg.Transparency = 1.0
--local rMotor = WaitForChild(Torso, 'Right Shoulder') --rMotor.C1 = rMotor.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2) TorsoConnection = Torso.Touched:connect(Trample) Horse.Touched:connect(Trample) end end
local function SetHealth(factor) local ratio = Humanoid.Health/Humanoid.MaxHealth Humanoid.MaxHealth = Humanoid.MaxHealth + factor
print('setting', Humanoid.MaxHealth, ratio, factor)
if factor > 0 then while Humanoid.Health < ratio * Humanoid.MaxHealth do Humanoid.Health = ratio * Humanoid.MaxHealth wait() end else while Humanoid.Health > ratio * Humanoid.MaxHealth do Humanoid.Health = ratio * Humanoid.MaxHealth wait() end end end
local function CreateHelpText() if Gui.Parent then return end Gui = Instance.new('ScreenGui') Gui.Parent = WaitForChild(Player, 'PlayerGui')
local sText = Instance.new('TextLabel') sText.Parent = Gui sText.Text = "Can't throw your Horse while you are riding it! Please unequip and reequip to throw." sText.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18 sText.Font = Enum.Font.ArialBold sText.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 sText.Size = UDim2.new(0, 500, 0, 100) sText.TextWrapped = true sText.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -200, 0, -100) sText.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) sText.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) sText.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.5
sText:TweenPosition(UDim2.new(0.5, -250, 0, 70), 1, 1, 1, true)
wait(7.5) Gui:ClearAllChildren() Gui.Parent = nil end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = WaitForChild(Character, 'Torso') Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid')
AnimateScript = WaitForChild(Character, 'Animate')
RightLeg = WaitForChild(Character, 'Right Leg') LeftLeg = WaitForChild(Character, 'Left Leg') Mouse = mouse --SetHealth(Factor) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key = key:lower() if key == 'q' then if Riding == true then --CreateHelpText() elseif Tool.Enabled then ThrowHorse() end end end) end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 1, 1) end
local function OnUnequipped() if FlightSpin then FlightSpin:Destroy() end if FlightPower then FlightPower:Destroy() end if FlightHold then FlightHold:Destroy() end
--RightLeg.Transparency = 0.0 --LeftLeg.Transparency = 0.0
--DestroyCloneLegs() --SetHealth(-Factor) Riding = false if TorsoConnection then TorsoConnection:disconnect() end
Horse.Size = Vector3.new(1.25, 8.5, 2)
if SitAnim then SitAnim:Stop() end HorseActivate.Value = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)
